verbose_text: Moreover, Stasimon deficiency converges on SMA related mechanisms of p53 upregulation to induce phosphorylation of p53 through activation of p38 mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK), and pharmacological inhibition of this kinase prevents motor neuron death in SMA mice.
evidence: Stasimon deficiency converges on SMA-related mechanisms of p53 upregulation to induce phosphorylation of p53
